definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
words/speech/to say/to talk
visitor's book/CL:本[ben3]
guestbook

sentences.english: We'll keep you posted on developments with this one as it nears its release date.
sentences.chinese: 我們將保留您的留言於開發上和接近釋出遊戲時。

sentences.english: If you may have any question, please leave them below.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙妮有任何問題，請在預告下方留言。

sentences.english: I encourage you to share yours with us by leaving a comment below.
sentences.chinese: 我鼓勵你在留言裏同我們一起分享你的經驗教訓。

sentences.english: No, there are no messages for you.
Many moving comments have been recorded in the visitors' book.
sentences.chinese: 留言簿上記着許多動人的評語。

sentences.english: Also, how should I handle negative comments on my blog?
sentences.chinese: 還有，我該怎麼處理博客上的網友留言？

sentences.english: This is my new message board(blog).
You can restrict messages, friend requests, comments, group invitations and instant messages.
sentences.chinese: 你可以限制留言，交友請求，邀請圈子和即時信息。

sentences.english: Last night the talk here was all of Westeros.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚這裏的留言全是關於維斯特洛伊的。

sentences.english: A. Wendy, I don't like my outgoing message, you do one for you.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡我的外放電話留言，你來給我設一個。

sentences.english: Comments that consist of only the commenters name are spammy.
sentences.chinese: 留言內容中只有評論人暱稱的評論可能爲垃圾評論。

sentences.english: More than 500 people have written on Mr. Wen’s Facebook “wall,” in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 超過500人在溫家寶總理的留言牆上用中英文留言。

sentences.english: More than 500 people have written on Mr. Wen’s Facebook “wall,” in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 超過500人在溫家寶總理的留言牆上用中英文留言。

sentences.english: This note was left by Tom, who was here a moment ago.
sentences.chinese: 留言條是湯姆留下的，他剛走一會兒。

sentences.english: The sample application used here is a simple message board.
sentences.chinese: 這裏使用的示例應用程序是一個簡單的留言板。

definition: to comment on/to discuss/comment/commentary/CL:篇[pian1]
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
to share (let others have some of sth good)
to welcome/welcome
article/essay/literary works/writings/hidden meaning/CL:篇[pian1],段[duan4],頁|页[ye4]
backstage area/behind-the-scenes supporter/(computing) back-end/background
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
server push (computing)
oh (interjection indicating doubt or surprise)
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
to chant
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
variant of 讚|赞[zan4]
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
